posts.author: glad
posts.post_text: August 14, 2014 at 3:12 PM#2make sure that the Macros you want to import is placed in the same folder on the USB that the console exports to/gma2/macros/are you trying to import via menu (Setup>Show>Import/Export>Import>Macros) or via commandline?
